archimate:BusinessEvent.name: ACC002 Mishandling of critical and/ or sensitive information by authorised users
archimate:BusinessEvent.documentation:
An authorised user unintentionally discloses sensitive/critical information. Assessment guidance:
At lower levels of threat strength (i.e. individuals with limited or no access privileges) the threat is likely to have access to less sensitive/critical information, resulting in reduced impact from disclosure. At higher levels of threat strength (i.e. individuals that have been assigned privileged access such as administrators) the threat will have access to more sensitive/critical information, resulting in greater impact from disclosure.
